Classes/STDThread.html#/c:objc(cs)STDThr.name: hardwareConcurrency
Classes/STDThread.html#/c:objc(cs)STDThr.abstract: The number of concurrent threads supported by the implementation.

Classes/STDThread.html#/c:objc(cs)STDThr.name: -join:
Classes/STDThread.html#/c:objc(cs)STDThr.abstract: Waits for a thread to finish its execution.

Classes/STDThread.html#/c:objc(cs)STDThr.name: -detach:
Classes/STDThread.html#/c:objc(cs)STDThr.abstract: Permits the thread to execute independently from the thread handle.
